attributes.action: stop Prime Minister using £1m on plane paint in a time of unprecedented crisis.
attributes.additional_details: It is an absurd waste of money at a time when there are greater financial pressures and concerns other than how nice his plane looks. I want the government to stop the Prime Minister from doing this ridiculous thing.
attributes.background: bring it to a debate and ask him if he thinks this is a reasonable way to spend taxpayers money at this time

rejection.details: By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.
